original_text: And they cast out many demons and anointed with oil many who were sick and healed them.
korean_text: 많은 귀신을 쫓아내며 많은 병자에게 기름을 발라 고치더라

sentences.original_text: And they cast out many demons
and anointed with oil many who were sick
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 앓는 많은 사람들에게 기름을 발랐습니다.
